title: Emergence: A Space Opera
description: I await thee, Iara—the Book of Elem A planet said to be heaven itself is about to appear in the firmament. The armies of the Empire and rebel factions prepare to stake their claims but an ancient evil has emerged and its eyes have been fixed upon Iara for millennia. A runaway and a cult apprentice will both find themselves drawn into the core of this conflict. Their destinies are tangled with those of the Empire, the rebellion, the Church of Elem, a menagerie of monsters, and the universe itself. Heresy, fellowship, valor, and darkness will all emerge—and be tested to the breaking point.
author: McCallum J. Morgan
